dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3123 IH: NICS Review Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Takano introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To require records of the national instant criminal background check system to be retained for at least 90 days.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the NICS Review Act of 2023.

section.header: Requirement that NICS records be retained for at least 90 days
section.text: Section 511 of division B of the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2012 (34 U.S.C. 40901 note; Public Law 112â€“55; 125 Stat. 632) is amended by striking no more than 24 hours and inserting no fewer than 90 days.
